# StudyFire - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
StudyFire is a gamified consistency tracker built with React + Vite, TailwindCSS, and Framer Motion.

## Tech Stack
- React 18 with Vite
- TailwindCSS for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- Lucide React for icons
- localStorage for persistence

## Design Guidelines
- Dark mode by default
- Glassmorphism and glowing effects
- Fire/orange accent colors
- Playful but intense personality
- Duolingo-style motivational feedback

## Key Features
- Non-editable challenge creation (immutable once created)
- Real-time timer tracking
- Fire streak system
- Bet file accountability
- Motivational AI feedback
